name: facebook-birthdaybot-bot
description: Simple facebook scraper wich makes birthday wish

scripts.go: zip -r code.zip . && aws --profile quiche s3 cp code.zip s3://quiche-lambda/birthdaybot/code.zip && aws --profile quiche lambda update-function-code --region eu-west-1 --function-name arn:aws:lambda:eu-west-1:310766226378:function:birthdaybot-dev-run --s3-bucket quiche-lambda --s3-key birthdaybot/code.zip --publish

author: Vlastimil Venclik
